title: The Talos Principle MULTi14-PROPHET
description:
The Talos Principle  (c) Croteam

release date ...: December 2768
protection .....: Steam + Custom
# of discs .....: 1
languages ......: EN/FR/DE/IT/ES/PL/RU/PT-BR/CZ/CR/
                  KR/JP/CN-S/CN-T

The Talos Principle is a philosophical first-person
puzzle game  from  Croteam,  the  creators  of  the
legendary Serious Sam games, written by Tom  Jubert
(FTL, The Swapper) and Jonas Kyratzes (The Sea Will
Claim Everything).

As if  awakening  from  a  deep  sleep,  you   find
yourself  in  a  strange,  contradictory  world  of
ancient ruins and advanced  technology.  Tasked  by
your creator with solving a series of  increasingly
complex puzzles, you must decide  whether  to  have
faith or to ask the difficult  questions:  Who  are
you? What is your purpose? And what are  you  going
to do about it?

This release also includes all current DLC content:

* Road To Gehenna DLC
* Serious DLC
* Soundtrack
* Bonus Content
* Prototype DLC

1- Unpack, burn or mount
2- Install the game
3- Copy the cracked content from PROPHET dir to
<installdir>/Bin/
4- Go To Hell!

NOTE:
Language can be changed in the Options menu
